p.s: File_Archive will let you manipulate easily the tar, gz, tgz, bz2, tbz, zip, ar (or deb) files
p.d: This library is strongly object oriented. It makes it very easy to use, writing simple code, yet the library is very powerfull. It lets you easily read or generate tar, gz, tgz, bz2, tbz, zip, ar (or deb) archives to files, memory, mail or standard output. See http://poocl.la-grotte.org for a tutorial
